retail-app-001.name: Build Cloud POS System
retail-app-001.description: Develop cloud-based point-of-sale with offline mode, receipt printing, and payment terminal integration
retail-app-001.notes: Support multiple payment methods including cash, card, mobile wallets with EMV certification

retail-app-001.name: Implement Inventory Management
retail-app-001.description: Real-time inventory tracking with barcode scanning, automated reordering, and multi-location support
retail-app-001.notes: Include low-stock alerts, supplier management, and warehouse integration

retail-app-001.name: Customer Loyalty Program
retail-app-001.description: Build loyalty system with points, rewards, tiers, and personalized promotions
retail-app-001.notes: SMS/email marketing integration, birthday rewards, and referral program

retail-app-001.name: Sales Analytics Dashboard
retail-app-001.description: Comprehensive reporting with sales trends, product performance, and employee metrics
retail-app-001.notes: Real-time dashboards, custom reports, forecasting, and export capabilities

retail-app-001.name: Multi-Store Management
retail-app-001.description: Centralized management for multiple locations with consolidated inventory and reporting
retail-app-001.notes: Store transfers, location-based pricing, role-based access per store

retail-app-001.name: E-Commerce Integration
retail-app-001.description: Integrate with online store platforms for unified inventory and order management
retail-app-001.notes: Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento integration with real-time sync

retail-app-001.name: Employee Management System
retail-app-001.description: Staff scheduling, time tracking, performance monitoring, and commission calculation
retail-app-001.notes: Shift management, attendance tracking, sales performance metrics, payroll integration

retail-app-001.name: Supplier & Vendor Portal
retail-app-001.description: Supplier management with purchase orders, receiving, invoicing, and vendor performance tracking
retail-app-001.notes: Automated PO creation, EDI integration, vendor scorecards, payment terms management

retail-app-001.name: Customer Relationship Management
retail-app-001.description: CRM system with customer profiles, purchase history, preferences, and communication tools
retail-app-001.notes: Customer segmentation, targeted marketing campaigns, feedback management, support ticketing

retail-app-001.name: Mobile App for Store Associates
retail-app-001.description: Mobile application for inventory checks, customer lookup, and mobile checkout
retail-app-001.notes: iOS and Android apps, barcode scanning, clienteling features, endless aisle functionality

retail-app-001.name: Returns & Exchange Management
retail-app-001.description: Comprehensive returns processing with refund management, exchange workflows, and fraud detection
retail-app-001.notes: Return authorization, restocking fees, store credit, cross-channel returns

retail-app-001.name: Gift Card & Store Credit System
retail-app-001.description: Digital and physical gift cards with balance tracking, activation, and redemption
retail-app-001.notes: Gift card sales, reloading, partial redemptions, expiration tracking

retail-app-001.name: Price Management & Promotions
retail-app-001.description: Dynamic pricing engine with promotional campaigns, discounts, and markdown management
retail-app-001.notes: Tiered pricing, bundle deals, BOGO offers, scheduled promotions, clearance automation

retail-app-001.name: Security & Loss Prevention
retail-app-001.description: Fraud detection, theft prevention, transaction monitoring, and audit trail management
retail-app-001.notes: Anomaly detection, void/discount monitoring, employee activity tracking, PCI compliance

retail-app-001.name: Tax Management & Compliance
retail-app-001.description: Automated tax calculation, reporting, and compliance for multi-jurisdictional operations
retail-app-001.notes: Multi-tax authority support, sales tax reporting, VAT/GST compliance, tax exemptions

financial-app-001.name: Build Trading Execution Engine
financial-app-001.description: High-frequency trading system with smart order routing, execution algorithms, and real-time market data
financial-app-001.notes: FIX protocol integration, latency optimization, order types (market, limit, stop, trailing)

financial-app-001.name: Portfolio Management System
financial-app-001.description: Real-time portfolio tracking with asset allocation, rebalancing, and performance analytics
financial-app-001.notes: Multi-asset class support (stocks, bonds, ETFs, options, crypto), tax-loss harvesting

financial-app-001.name: Risk Assessment Engine
financial-app-001.description: Advanced risk modeling with VaR, stress testing, scenario analysis, and Monte Carlo simulations
financial-app-001.notes: Market risk, credit risk, operational risk assessment with regulatory reporting

financial-app-001.name: Compliance & Regulatory Reporting
financial-app-001.description: Automated regulatory compliance reporting for SOX, PCI-DSS, GDPR with audit trails
financial-app-001.notes: KYC/AML verification, transaction monitoring, suspicious activity reporting (SAR)

financial-app-001.name: Market Data Integration
financial-app-001.description: Real-time and historical market data feeds from major exchanges and data providers
financial-app-001.notes: Multi-exchange connectivity, data normalization, WebSocket streaming, FIX/FAST protocols

financial-app-001.name: Order Management System (OMS)
financial-app-001.description: Centralized order management with trade lifecycle tracking and position management
financial-app-001.notes: Multi-asset OMS, allocation algorithms, execution management, post-trade processing

financial-app-001.name: Client Onboarding & KYC
financial-app-001.description: Digital client onboarding with identity verification, KYC/AML checks, and account opening
financial-app-001.notes: Document verification, biometric authentication, sanctions screening, risk scoring

financial-app-001.name: Performance Attribution & Analytics
financial-app-001.description: Portfolio performance analysis with attribution, benchmarking, and factor analysis
financial-app-001.notes: Brinson attribution, risk-adjusted returns, factor exposure, custom benchmarks

financial-app-001.name: AI Trading Algorithms
financial-app-001.description: Machine learning-powered trading strategies with backtesting and performance optimization
financial-app-001.notes: Sentiment analysis, pattern recognition, predictive modeling, algorithmic execution

financial-app-001.name: Client Portal & Reporting
financial-app-001.description: Secure client portal with real-time access, document management, and custom reporting
financial-app-001.notes: White-label capabilities, mobile app, secure messaging, e-signature integration

financial-app-001.name: Trade Settlement & Custody
financial-app-001.description: Automated trade settlement, reconciliation, and custody management
financial-app-001.notes: DVP settlement, corporate actions, cash management, custodian integration

financial-app-001.name: Margin & Collateral Management
financial-app-001.description: Real-time margin calculation, collateral optimization, and margin call automation
financial-app-001.notes: Initial/maintenance margin, haircut calculations, margin lending, SPAN integration

financial-app-001.name: Financial Reporting & Tax
financial-app-001.description: Automated financial statements, tax reporting, and cost basis tracking
financial-app-001.notes: 1099 generation, realized/unrealized gains, wash sales, FIFO/LIFO accounting

financial-app-001.name: Fraud Detection & Security
financial-app-001.description: Real-time fraud detection with behavioral analytics and anomaly detection
financial-app-001.notes: Transaction monitoring, velocity checks, device fingerprinting, multi-factor authentication

it-app-001.name: Infrastructure Monitoring System
it-app-001.description: Real-time monitoring of servers, networks, applications with SNMP, WMI, and agent-based collection
it-app-001.notes: Multi-protocol support, threshold-based alerting, auto-discovery, health dashboards

it-app-001.name: ITSM Incident Management
it-app-001.description: ITIL-compliant incident, problem, and change management with SLA tracking and escalation
it-app-001.notes: ServiceNow/Jira integration, automated ticket routing, knowledge base, approval workflows

it-app-001.name: Automation & Orchestration
it-app-001.description: Workflow automation engine with runbook execution, remediation scripts, and CI/CD integration
it-app-001.notes: Ansible/Terraform integration, scheduled jobs, event-driven automation, webhook triggers

it-app-001.name: Asset & Configuration Management
it-app-001.description: IT asset tracking with CMDB, software license management, and compliance auditing
it-app-001.notes: Auto-discovery, asset lifecycle tracking, vendor management, cost allocation

it-app-001.name: AIOps Anomaly Detection
it-app-001.description: AI-powered anomaly detection, root cause analysis, and predictive failure prevention
it-app-001.notes: Machine learning models for pattern recognition, correlation engine, noise reduction

it-app-001.name: Service Catalog & Portal
it-app-001.description: Self-service portal for IT requests with catalog management, approvals, and fulfillment automation
it-app-001.notes: Request templates, multi-level approvals, provisioning workflows, user portal

ai-app-001.name: ML Model Training Pipeline
ai-app-001.description: Distributed training infrastructure with GPU clusters, hyperparameter tuning, and experiment tracking
ai-app-001.notes: TensorFlow/PyTorch support, distributed training, model versioning, experiment management

ai-app-001.name: NLP Processing Engine
ai-app-001.description: Natural language processing with sentiment analysis, entity extraction, text classification, and translation
ai-app-001.notes: BERT/GPT integration, multilingual support, named entity recognition, topic modeling

ai-app-001.name: Computer Vision System
ai-app-001.description: Image recognition, object detection, facial recognition, and video analytics capabilities
ai-app-001.notes: YOLO/ResNet models, real-time inference, custom model training, edge deployment

ai-app-001.name: Recommendation Engine
ai-app-001.description: Personalized recommendation system using collaborative filtering, content-based, and hybrid approaches
ai-app-001.notes: Real-time recommendations, A/B testing, cold-start handling, explainability features

ai-app-001.name: MLOps Platform
ai-app-001.description: End-to-end MLOps with model registry, deployment pipelines, monitoring, and governance
ai-app-001.notes: CI/CD for ML, feature store, model serving, drift detection, A/B testing framework

ai-app-001.name: AutoML Platform
ai-app-001.description: Automated machine learning with neural architecture search, automated feature engineering, and model selection
ai-app-001.notes: No-code ML, auto feature engineering, ensemble methods, explainable AI

networking-app-001.name: Network Discovery & Topology
networking-app-001.description: Automated network discovery with SNMP, CDP, LLDP, device fingerprinting, and dynamic topology mapping
networking-app-001.notes: Multi-vendor support (Cisco, Juniper, Arista), layer 2/3 discovery, dependency mapping

networking-app-001.name: Performance Monitoring
networking-app-001.description: Real-time monitoring of bandwidth utilization, latency, packet loss, jitter with NetFlow/sFlow analysis
networking-app-001.notes: Interface monitoring, QoS analysis, baseline anomaly detection, capacity planning

networking-app-001.name: Security & Firewall Management
networking-app-001.description: Unified firewall management, IDS/IPS integration, threat intelligence, and security policy enforcement
networking-app-001.notes: Multi-firewall orchestration, rule optimization, compliance auditing, threat feeds integration

networking-app-001.name: Configuration Management
networking-app-001.description: Automated config backup, change tracking, compliance auditing, and rollback capabilities
networking-app-001.notes: Version control, config templates, scheduled backups, drift detection, bulk changes

networking-app-001.name: SD-WAN Orchestration
networking-app-001.description: Software-defined WAN management with policy-based routing, path optimization, and application steering
networking-app-001.notes: Multi-link aggregation, dynamic path selection, application-aware routing, zero-touch provisioning

networking-app-001.name: Zero Trust Architecture
networking-app-001.description: Implement zero-trust network security with micro-segmentation, identity-based access, and continuous verification
networking-app-001.notes: Micro-segmentation policies, least-privilege access, device trust scoring, continuous authentication
